attributes.additional_details: Mr. Philip Taylor is probably the one individual in the world, in history, who has won the most world titles in any sporting event. He has also won around a hundred other internationally and globally recognised titles. He has been the leading light of darts, in a career that has spanned at least 25 years at the very very, top of his sport. It is ludicrous that other sports people get titles or OBE's / MBE's  for obtaining one medal, or actors for being in a good film etc., while Mr Taylor is ignored. I say Philip Taylor should have already received a title, OBE or MBE. If you agree with me that this man's achievemnts have remained unrecognised for too long, please add your name to my petition.
